name: Biochemistry Mastery
description: Tired of poring over massive textbooks to study for your biochemistry exams? With Biochemistry Mastery you can maximize your study time and conquer your biochemistry classes. Featuring over 400 practice questions, terminologies, mnemonics, and strategies, Biochemistry Mastery will help you improve your study habits, ace your biochem classes, and prepare for your future high-stakes exams.  Whether you are pursuing your degree, preparing for graduate school, or simply interested in the subject, you can study for FREE with the most comprehensive biochemistry app on the market. We are always improving our app and adding new content at no additional cost.   Biochemistry Mastery was developed to give you an edge by obsessively focusing on providing maximum learning in minimal time. Review biochem practice questions anywhere, anytime -- no network connection required!  Features:   400+ practice questions, answers and complete explanations  100+ Terminology flashcards  Proven strategies to help you ace your test   The most comprehensive list of biochemistry mnemonics on the market  Get immediate feedback to track your overall progress as you study and master new topics
